thread.title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
thread.title_full: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley - The Morning Call

author: mcall.com
title: Day Trips from the Lehigh Valley
text:
DAY TRIPPIN'
•Vatican Splendors, Franklin Institute, Nov. 12. $100. St. Jane's Trips and Tours, Carol, 610-252-4233.
•911 Memorial & Museum, Oct. 10. $61; $40, day on your own. Bethlehem K-9 Wish Fund, Susie, 610-217-4293.
•Christmas Show, American Music Theatre, Dec. 9. $88. St. Elizabeth of Hungary Golden Agers, Barbara, 610-266-2874.
•Longwood Gardens, Nightscapes lights and music show, Oct. 14. $62. Philly Pops holiday concert, Dec. 6. Bethlehem Garden Club, Jacqueline, 610-867-7463.
•Yankees/Indians game, Aug. 22. $120. Eating and Walking tour, Arthur Avenue, Bronx, Oct. 24. $68. St. Thomas More, Lori, 484-951-0440.
•Winterthur, Tiffany Glass exhibit, tram ride, Sept. 22. $109. Allentown Garden Club, Ellie, 610-262-0682.
•Washington D.C., Library of Congress National Book Festival or day on your own, Sept. 5. $50. Deadline: Aug. 23. Lower Macungie Library, 610-966-6864.
•"Twist & Shout ," Hunterdon Hills, Aug. 19. $78. PPL Retirees, Sandy, 610-509-7204.
•"Twist & Shout," Hunterdon Hills, Aug. 20. $86. "OctoberFest," Split Rock Lodge, Oct. 14. $70. "Social Security," Hunterdon Hills, Oct. 22. $80. "Christmas Show," American Music Theatre, Nov. 17. $90. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788.
•"Amazing Grace," Broadway, Nov. 7. $140. Emmanuel United Methodist Church, Jeff, 610-821-5572.
•"Live At The Sands," Penn's Peak, Sept. 24. $76 . Notre Dame of Bethlehem 55+ Club, Joyce, 610-866-0360.
 •Broadway shows , choice of "Book of Mormon" $162; or "Aladdin" $130. Oct. 18. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700.
•"Miracle of Christmas," Sight & Sound Theatre, Dec. 2. $90. St. Ann's Church, Kay, 484-554-1864.
•Atlantic City Air Show, Resorts, food, Sept. 2. $50. The Marcels, Mount Airy, buffet, Oct. 13. $58. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981.
•Christmas Spectacular, Radio City Music Hall, orchestra seats, Dec. 1. $99. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036.
•Christmas Show, American Music Theater, Nov. 28. $110. Pen Argyl Alumni Association, Bill, 610-863-6297.
•"South Pacific," Allenberry Playhouse, Aug. 12. $82. "Impersonator: Barry Manilo," Mount Airy Casino, Sept. 15. $60. "Impersonators: Frank Sinatra/Barbara Streisand," Mount Airy Casino, Nov. 10. $60. "Christmas Show," American Music Theater, Dec. 9. $86.Walnutport Senior Citizens, Dianne, 610-767-5646.
• " Over the River and Through The Woods," Rainbow Dinner Theatre, Sept. 16. $75. Bavarian Christmas: Brownstone, Ace in the Hole, Dec. 8. $80. St. John Fisher Senior Citizens, Bill, 610-264-0920.
•"Over the River and Through the Woods," Rainbow Dinner Theatre, Aug. 19. $69. "Social Security," Hunterdon Hills, Sept. 23. $78. "Germanfest," Ehrhardt's, Oct. 21. $75. "Christmas Show," American Music Theater, Nov. 4. $90. Allentown AARP Chapter 5415, Jeanne, 610-437-4265.
•Broadway shows, choice of "Finding Neverland," $155; or "Something Rotten," $145. Sept. 9. Lancaster Amish Farmlands, lunch, Sept. 9. $62. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700.
•Barry Manilow tribute, Mount Airy, Sept. 14. $65. The Morning Call retirees, Phyl, 610-432-9442.
OVERNIGHT TRIPS
•Branson at the Beach, Ocean City, Md., March 21-24. Five shows, three dinners, three breakfasts, more. MORA/Lighthouse Travelers, Roland, 610-703-1788.
•Finger Lakes, Seneca Falls, Oct. 2-3, $377, winery tours, more. Nativity Lutheran, Teri, 484-547-7690.
•Pittsburgh Express , Oct. 14-16, $445, Duquesne incline, tour of Phipps Conservation, Botanical gardens, Falling Water, Flight 93 Memorial. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700.
• New York Winery Tour, four wineries, boat ride, Sept. 20-21. $268. Memphis, Tenn., and Tunica, Miss., Elvis Presley's Graceland, Oct. 17-23. $755. School Retirees, Joanne, 610-398-0981.
•Villa Roma Resort, Callicoon, N.Y., Sept. 21-25. $520. Costa del Sol & Barcelona, all-inclusive, Feb. 5-March 3. $3,599. Assumption Church Travel Club, John, 610-767-3036.
•Vermont, Shelburne Village, Grandma Moses Museum, Hildene, Oct. 9-11. $504. Allentown Art Museum Auxiliary, Ellie, 610-262-0682.
•Finger Lakes, Sept. 22-24. $464. Pittsburgh Express, Oct. 14-16. $445. Lehigh Valley Active Life, 610-437-3700.
•Italy, Venice, Padua, Florence, Assisi, Rome, March 29-April 7. $3,890. Most Blessed Sacrament Church, 610-845-2460.
•Woodloch Pines Resort, Hawley, all-inclusive, Nov. 16-20. $592. PPL Retirees, Mary, 610-395-6902.
•Cape Cod, Boston, Hyannis, Martha's Vineyard, Nantucket, Sandwich, Provincetown, Newport, guided tours, five breakfasts, five dinners and more, Sept. 13-18. $1,250. St. Jane's Church Trips & Tours, Carol, 610-252-4233.
•Mackinaw Island, island carriage tour, Mackinaw City and Frankenmuth tours, Aug. 23-29. $769. Vermont, Ben & Jerry's, Vermont Teddy Bear Factory, Sugarbush Cheese & Maple Farm, Hildene, Woodstock, and more, Sept. 21-24. $489. Bangor AARP Chapter 4135, Deanna, 610-588-4623.
•Phillies-Red Sox, Fenway Park, Boston, Sept. 4-6, $475. Emmanuel United Methodist Church, Jeff, 610-821-5572.
•Finger Lakes, Sept. 10-12, $400, winery tour, National Soaring Museum, more. St. Joseph's Prime Time, Florence, 610-797-5452.
Sponsored Trips are for nonprofit organizations. Send information two weeks in advance: event, date, cost, phone number. Fax: 610-820-6693; email: news@mcall.com ; mail: Trips, The Morning Call, Box 1260, Allentown, 18105-1260.
